import { BsDash, BsPlus, BsReverseBackspaceReverse } from "react-icons/bs" import currencyFormatter from "currency-formatter"; import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" const Cart = () => { const { products, totalPrice , totalQuantities } = useSelector(state => state.CartReducer); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (

Your Cart

{products.length > 0 ? <>
Picture
Name
Price
Inc/Dec
Total
Remove
{products.map(product => (
{product.name}
{currencyFormatter.format(product.discount, { code: 'USD' })}
dispatch({ type: "DEC", payload: product.id })}> {product.quantity} dispatch({ type: "INC", payload: product.id })}>
{currencyFormatter.format(product.discount * product.quantity, { code: 'USD' })}
dispatch({ type: "REMOVE", payload: product.id })}>
))}
Summary
Total items:
{totalQuantities}
Total Price
{currencyFormatter.format(totalPrice, { code: 'USD' })}
: "your cart is empty"}
) } export default Cart
